text: [Mo hamcunon ʙa kofiron muhlat medodem] To on goh ki pajomʙaron [az nuzuli azoʙ] ma'jus şudand va [mardum] pindoştand, ki ʙa onon durūƣ gufta şudaast. [Dar in hangom] Jorii Mo ʙa suroƣaşon omad. Pas, har kiro xostem, naçot joft, va[-le] azoʙi saxti Mo az gurūhi muçrimon ʙozgardonida nameşavad
